job_description:
Hi,
Hope you are doing well!!
I have an urgent requirement with one of my clients. Please find the job details below and forward me your updated resume along with your contact details at Jitendra.s@noviainfotech.com

Job Title: Full Stack Technical Lead (Java / Angular / AWS)
 
 Location: Malvern, PA ‚Äì Hybrid Onsite
 
 
 
Job Description
We are seeking a highly skilled Full Stack Technical Lead with deep expertise in Java, Angular, and AWS to lead and deliver mission-critical application development initiatives. The ideal candidate will drive end-to-end design, development, deployment, and operational support of scalable cloud-native systems using modern frameworks and DevOps practices.
 
Key Responsibilities
Lead full-stack development activities using Java (11/17), Angular 10, and AWS cloud services.
Architect and implement scalable microservices and RESTful APIs.
Design and develop front-end user interfaces with Angular and backend components using Spring Boot, JPA, Hibernate, and related frameworks.
Develop solutions using AWS services including Lambda, ECS (Fargate), Step Functions, S3, Glue, CloudWatch, IAM, API Gateway, Secret Manager, and CloudFormation.
Perform database development and optimization in PostgreSQL and DynamoDB.
Integrate and work with GraphQL, NestJS, Step Functions, and Jest frameworks where applicable.
Establish and enforce secure coding standards, IAM policies, and best practices for secure API development.
Lead CI/CD pipeline development using GitHub Actions, Docker, and CloudFormation.
Implement and support monitoring, alerting, and logging solutions using CloudWatch, Splunk, Grafana, and AppDynamics.
Work in an Agile environment and collaborate closely with Scrum teams, contributing to planning, refinement, and delivery checkpoints.
Mentor and guide developers, participate in code reviews, and ensure adherence to software engineering best practices.
 
Required Skills & Experience
Minimum 8+ years of full-stack development experience.
Strong hands-on experience with:
Java 11/17, Spring Boot, JPA, Hibernate, Spring Security
Angular 10, front-end application development
AWS cloud services, including Step Functions, ECS, Lambda, S3, API Gateway, IAM, Secret Manager, CloudWatch, Glue
Strong understanding of microservices, event-driven architecture, RESTful design, and distributed systems.
Experience with relational (PostgreSQL) and NoSQL (DynamoDB) databases.
Proficiency with DevOps toolchains: GitHub, Bitbucket, Jira, Bamboo, Maven/Gradle, SonarQube, ServiceNow, Confluence.
Expertise in testing frameworks including JUnit, Mockito, Jest, and integration testing.
Hands-on experience with CI/CD, containerization, automation, and cloud infrastructure.
 


 Jitendra Singh
 Sr.Technical Recruiter
Jitendra.s@noviainfotech.com
